Class TreasureScooperWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.game.world.TreasureScooperWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResettableGameClass, GameWorldBasic, GameWorldPrivileged, GameWorldUpdatable

    public class TreasureScooperWorld
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameWorldPrivileged
    The class managing and representing the game world.
